author: newsr.in
title: Samsung’s 12-Inch Windows 10 Tablet with Possible 4K Display Sent to India for Testing
text: Back in August, word that Samsung was looking to make a comeback to manufacturing Windows-powered devices surfaced online. You might probably remember that, years ago, good old Sammy was offering a line of Windows-based tablets called ATIV. The devices didn’t achieve great popularity, but it appears that the Korean tech giant is willing to try yet again. A fresh report coming out of »
